page.title: 06The Twittocks, Twyning
page.content: Derivation - Twit = Owl ocks = Oaks On the A38 3 miles north of Tewkesbury, 10 miles south of Worcester in the crook of the M50 and M5 spur. Five dwellings:- a small farm of 26 acres. Parents work away from farm; children go to Tewkesbury schools. Annexe added to renovated farm house for grandparents; two pairs of cottages; first renovated and housing two families. The parents work in Tewkesbury and Gloucester and the children attend Tewkesbury school. Last pair of cottages owner/occupying one husband former electrician, rears pigs and geese; finally detached house undergoing renovations by new owners running small contract Hire business. Mostly common land which offers free grazing. Hourly bus service to Worcester, Tewkesbury and Gloucester.
